name: 張厥煒
objective: 本課程將介紹多類數位多媒體系統的應用與發展，不同媒體種類的運算處理方式以及相關的設計技術與概念。其中包括: RGBD 數位影像，電腦圖學，電腦動畫，以及電腦視訊等媒體形態。同時探討電腦視覺，特徵點應用，深度點雲，多媒體中的特效，影像與視訊資料庫搜尋與索引等內容，以及AR/MR等數位媒體應用的原理。對多媒體的現今技術與未來發展方向，做系統性的說明與討論。
schedule:
週次1 Introduction to Multimedia
週次2 Multimedia Data Representations and Processing (1)
週次3 Multimedia Data Representations and Processing (2)
週次4 RGBD Applications Case Study (1)
週次5 RGBD Applications Case Study (2)
週次6 Multimedia Program Design
週次7 Feature Extraction and Matching  　
週次8 Depth Information and Point Cloud (PCL)
週次9 Computer Vision and Multiple View Geometry
週次10 Special Topics Discussion (1)
週次11 Special Topics Discussion (2)
週次12 Special Topics Discussion (3) 　
週次13 Augmented Reality (AR) and Mixed Reality (MR)
週次14 Multi-Dimensional Indexing 　
週次15 Multimedia Database and Content-Based Retrieval
週次16 Sports Information Systems 　
週次17 Final Term Project Demo (1)
週次18 Final Term Project Demo (2)
scorePolicy:
1.　　Multimedia Program Design 20% (each person)
2.　　Oral Presentation 30% (team work)
3.　　Paper Survey Study Report 15% (each person)
4.　　Multimedia Related Term Project 5% (proposal)+30% (team work)
